Palo Alto, CA (one block from the Caltrain) - FULL-TIME, INTERN, H1B welcome!

We're looking for Backend, iOS, Web and Android developers to join our 15-person team. Pulse makes the most downloaded news reading application for iPhone, iPad, Android and Windows Phone. At Pulse, you will work closely with a tight-nit team of experienced engineers. Each of us is part engineer, hacker and product designer. Pulse was originally founded in the Stanford Design School, and beautiful, user-centric design is at the heart of our product and work. We recently raised a Series A round of funding led by NEA and Greycroft.

Find out more about us here: http://www.pulse.me/jobs/ and feel free to send your resume to me at cristina@pulse.me
